name: DRUNK WEEZARD'S FARM
description:
In Drunk Weezard's Farm you've got yerself ten veggies to pick, just ten, pal! Go forth and pluck ten veggies while controlling the inebriated wizard! You'll only need three spells - Vegekinesis, Seeding and Watering - while you're picking the ten vegetables. Plant them with Seeding, water them with Watering to make 'em swell up, and haul 'em to the cart with Vegekinesis! Switch spells with the mouse wheel while harvesting the ten vegetables. 

Caution: the wizard's trashed, so it ain't gonna be easy to control!

Hold down that right mouse button and use the left one to cast spells, like a boss!

game designer - CO5MONAUT

3d artist/animator - Artem Zaitsev

programmer - Stas Pisarev
